Up.Statement:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT shop_id FROM [w2_Payment] WHERE shop_id = '0' AND payment_group_id = N'' AND payment_id = N'K11') BEGIN INSERT [dbo].[w2_Payment] ([shop_id], [payment_group_id], [payment_id], [payment_alt_id], [payment_name], [payment_name_mobile], [payment_price_kbn], [payment_price], [usable_price_min], [usable_price_max], [mobile_disp_flg], [display_order], [valid_flg], [del_flg], [date_created], [date_changed], [last_changed], [user_management_level_not_use]) VALUES (N'0', N'', N'K11', N'', N'仮クレジットカード', N'ｶﾘｸﾚｼﾞｯﾄ', N'0', CAST(0 AS Decimal(18, 0)), CAST(1 AS Decimal(18, 0)), NULL, N'3', 99, N'0', N'0', GETDATE() , GETDATE() , N'ｗ２ユーザー', N'') END GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT shop_id FROM [w2_PaymentPrice] WHERE shop_id = '0' AND payment_group_id = N'' AND payment_id = N'K11') BEGIN INSERT [dbo].[w2_PaymentPrice] ([shop_id], [payment_group_id], [payment_id], [payment_price_no], [tgt_price_bgn], [tgt_price_end], [payment_price], [del_flg], [date_created], [date_changed], [last_changed]) VALUES (N'0', N'', N'K11', 1, CAST(0 AS Decimal(18, 0)), CAST(0 AS Decimal(18, 0)), CAST(0 AS Decimal(18, 0)), N'0', GETDATE(), GETDATE(), N'ｗ２ユーザー') END GO
